description:
* Ability: To animate and make things come alive
He has the ability to animate and make things come alive, usually with adorable faces attached to them. Likes to use the phrase To the max a lot.
He sports a green ducktail hairdo. Like Rinko, he adores all things cute, but he is the first person to fall victim to Rinko`s "evil" side for calling her an insect and a small fry. He resembles Inuyama as a Rez-Boa-Dogz team leader in Air Gear as well as Boukuto no Ryu in Shaman King.
name: Ban Dicoot
